text: Mihai Răzvan Ungureanu (born 22 September 1968, Iași) is a Romanian politician, historian and diplomat. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2004 to 2007 and director of the Foreign Intelligence Service from 2007 to 2012. He was Prime Minister of Romania from 9 February 2012 until 9 May 2012. ==Education== He learned at Mathematics-Physics high school "Costache Negruzzi" from Iași. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian diplomats Category:Romanian historians Category:Prime Ministers of Romania
title: Mihai Răzvan Ungureanu
